name: acyl-CoA:malonyl-CoA C-acyltransferase (dihydromonacolin L-[acp]-forming)
definition: 9 Malonyl-CoA + 11 NADPH + 10 H+ + S-Adenosyl-L-methionine + Acyl-carrier protein <=> Dihydromonacolin L-[acyl-carrier protein] + 9 CoA + 9 CO2 + 11 NADP+ + S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine + 6 H2O
comment: multi-step reaction Acy-carrier protein is acp domain of LOVB [KO:K20981].
